questions.question: What is the traditional practice in Timor-Leste involving the exchange of gifts between families at marriage?

In which year did Timor-Leste gain independence?

choices: They participated actively in the resistance movement
They were all evacuated to other countries
questions.answer: They participated actively in the resistance movement

questions.question: Which international organization has been particularly active in promoting women's rights in Timor-Leste?

choices: Lowering the voting age for women

questions.question: Which economic sector in Timor-Leste has seen increased women's participation in recent years?

choices: Preventing and responding to domestic violence
questions.answer: Preventing and responding to domestic violence

questions.question: Which traditional role is often assigned to women in Timorese society?

choices: Limited access to reproductive health services
questions.answer: Limited access to reproductive health services
